item.title: Nix shell and Awesomeness: An Intro
item.description: Last year while working with @amitu, I came across this wonderful tool called Nix. I have been using Nix for almost all my projects now. I have written nix recipes for: rust, python, nodejs, elm, postgres, react, react-native. About Nix, its wiki says: Nix is a package manager and build system that parses reproducible build instructions specified in the Nix Expression Language, a pure functional language with lazy evaluation
